channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 06:32 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 06:32 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 06:17 Countering the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 06:17 Countering the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
